name: Ethan Rodriguez
bio: Leading the IEEE chapter with passion for technology and music. Computer Science major focused on software development and team building.
funFacts: 🎸 Plays electric guitar and has performed at campus events
☕ Can't start coding without a cup of coffee
🎮 Built his first video game at age 12
🌮 Favorite study snack: tacos from the campus food truck

name: Donovan Acosta
bio: Ensuring the safety and security of all IEEE activities and events. Engineering student with expertise in risk management and project coordination.
funFacts: 🛡️ Always has a backup plan for everything
📚 Reads 3 engineering books per month
🏃‍♂️ Runs 5 miles every morning before class
🎯 Can solve a Rubik's cube in under 2 minutes

bio: Keeping detailed records of all IEEE activities and maintaining clear communication channels. Computer Science student with strong organizational skills.
funFacts: 📝 Takes notes in 3 different languages
🌍 Speaks 4 languages fluently
🎨 Creates digital art in his spare time
☕ Drinks more coffee than the entire engineering department

name: Nick Galus
bio: Managing the financial aspects of the IEEE chapter with precision and care. Engineering student with expertise in financial planning and resource allocation.
funFacts: 💰 Can calculate complex budgets in his head
🎯 Never misses a deadline (seriously, never)
🏆 Won the campus math competition 3 years in a row

name: Veltman Jr Okey-Ejiowhor

name: Wenbin Luo
bio: Providing academic guidance and industry connections for IEEE members. Faculty member with extensive experience in engineering education and research.
funFacts: 🎓 Has published over 50 research papers
